TopicTitle: All asteroids B-E with the same mass?

Articles.Content:
I have an weird issue, all astroids from B to E, has not captured any A yet has the same mass, around 120 ton.
Size is different but weight is around the same. 
Is this an know bug or something caused by an mod? I have no mods related to asteroids directly.

Known bug as far as I know. Stock problem.

EDIT: there: http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/9392
